alert.note: Alert for Allen; Defiance; Fulton; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert; Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 13 at 6:42PM EDT until June 14 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 356 REMAINS VALID UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT /11 PM CDT/ TONIGHT FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN INDIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 12 COUNTIES IN NORTHERN INDIANA ALLEN IN DE KALB ELKHART KOSCIUSKO LA PORTE LAGRANGE MARSHALL NOBLE ST. JOSEPH IN STARKE STEUBEN WHITLEY IN MICHIGAN THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST MICHIGAN BERRIEN BRANCH CASS MI HILLSDALE ST. JOSEPH MI IN OHIO THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST OHIO ALLEN OH DEFIANCE FULTON OH HENRY PAULDING PUTNAM VAN WERT WILLIAMS THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALBION, ANGOLA, ANTWERP, ARCHBOLD, AUBURN, BASS LAKE, BENTON HARBOR, BENTON HEIGHTS, BLUFFTON, BREMEN, BRONSON, BRYAN, BUCHANAN, CASSOPOLIS, COLDWATER, COLUMBIA CITY, COLUMBUS GROVE, CONTINENTAL, CULVER, DEFIANCE, DELTA, DESHLER, DOWAGIAC, EDGERTON, EDWARDSBURG, ELKHART, FAIR PLAIN, FORT WAYNE, FREMONT, GARRETT, GOSHEN, HICKSVILLE, HILLSDALE, JONESVILLE, KENDALLVILLE, KNOX, LA PORTE, LAGRANGE, LEIPSIC, LIBERTY CENTER, LIGONIER, LIMA, LITCHFIELD, MARCELLUS, MENDON, MENTONE, MICHIGAN CITY, MISHAWAKA, MONTPELIER, NAPOLEON, NAPPANEE, NEW CARLISLE, NEW HAVEN, NILES, NORTH JUDSON, OHIO CITY, OTTAWA, PANDORA, PAULDING, PAW PAW LAKE, PAYNE, PLYMOUTH, SHERWOOD, SHIPSHEWANA, SOUTH BEND, SOUTH WHITLEY, SPENCERVILLE, ST. JOSEPH, STURGIS, SWANTON, SYRACUSE, THREE RIVERS, TOPEKA, TRI-LAKES, VAN WERT, WALKERTON, WARSAW, WAUSEON, WHITE PIGEON, AND WINONA LAKE.
